description:
June-August  SST Anomaly shows seasonal deviation in sea surface temperature  characteristics in 2016 during the SE Monsoon  season. 

It depicts some cooler than normal waters in the northern central region and in the south western waters surrounding Mauritius and Reunion. 

This data was derived using raster calculator in ArcGIS 10.3 to derive the 2016 seasonal average, and subtracted from this the long-term seasonal average from the 2003-2016 data series.
keywords: SST, anomaly, Africa, East Africa, Comoros, Kenya, Madagascar, Mauritius, Mayotte, Mozambique, Reunion, Seychelles, Somalia, United Republic of Tanzania, Southern Africa, South Africa
name: June-Aug 2016 SS T  Anomaly
